title: Pause
description: Pause has an 18 inch vertical repeat which consists of two nearly identical rows. The one row contains three periods followed by a comma, then by a space. The second row contains a space, then three periods followed by a comma. Printed in the orange colorway the design contains white commas and periods.
name: Sidewall
